sentences.english: Shadows are seen on a wall near the Zhongnanhai compound in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的北京，影子落在中南海的紅牆上。

sentences.english: Establishing demonstrative organic fields at Zhongnanhai would certainly be feasible.
sentences.chinese: 你要在中南海，弄一塊生態農業示範田，肯定可行。
